# Swirl Web Component Library

The Swirl Web Component Library provides a framework-agnostic foundation for UI
development for the [Swirl App](https://www.flipapp.de/). It implements a set of
solid UI components that are composable, performant, accessible and well-tested,
while also satisfying the UX and UI design requirements of the Swirl Design
System.

## What now?

- Check the ["Usage"](?path=/docs/usage-get-started--page) section for
  information on how to use the component library in your projects.
- Check the ["Contributions"](?path=/docs/contributions-get-started--page)
  section for information on how to contribute to the component library.
- Check the ["Requirements"](?path=/docs/requirements-style-guide--page) section
  for a deep dive into our principles for component development.
- Check the ["Components"](?path=/docs/components-swirlbutton--swirl-button)
  section for the documentation of our Web Components.
